column3: @fanquake I've added a commit that fixes @TheBlueMatt 's comments. If this change is okay we should squash and merge this.\n
@laanwj Thanks for fixing this up, I haven't had access to push the changes.\n
This should be in a contrib/debian/bitcoin-qt.manpages (and similarly for bitcoin-tx)\n
Actually, these two lines should just be wholesale removed, I believe.\n
I think so too - `make install` installs the man pages, there's no need for debian to do anything special.\n
No, mostly this is a flag for a build method that we dont use - so these variables are just entirely ignored :).\n
